name: Poor Lemon
description:
Poor Lemon loves Peach and she loves him too ,but as you know ,every love story has a villain and same is the case here. In our love story ,the villain is Mr Bananas (father of Peach) and he will not let Lemon and Peach be together because Lemon is poor.
Do you have it in you to meet the demands of Mr Bananas and make Lemon rich so that he can get the love of his life ?
With hundreds of handcrafted levels and tasks ,you will love every second of how the story unfolds .
Will Lemon finally get Peach ?
Everything depends on you !
